Description: UTUC TS1118BK-2X UTUC TS1118BK-2X Travel Safe Womens Short Shorts 2X Description The perfect compliment to our Travel Shirts Travel Safe Compression Shorts are another great way to protect your valuables no matter what you're wearing. A full 3" shorter in the leg than our Womens Shorts the "Short Shorts" are the latest in our entire line of UnderTech UnderCover products made especially for women. Custom built from cool comfortable CoolTech professional grade compression fabric; these shorts are cut specifically to fit a woman's body. They are extremely comfortable yet totally secure. And it can be worn with just about everything you own; gym shorts sweat pants slacks skirts and suits.There are eight convenient yet highly secure concealment pockets. Six are on the outside of the shorts with two of those being additionally secured with ultra-tough micro-zippers. Inside the waistband are two more pockets; one equipped with fold over "flap " just as secure but more easily accessible than a zippered pocket.Feaures. MicroPoly/Lycra blend.. Machine washable.. Color - Black.. Size - 2X.. Dimension - 5 x 2 x 10 in.. Item Weight - 1 lbs.
